Ever been tired of trying to make groups for something?
Then this is the perfect package for you!
GroupCreator is a package designed to create awesome groups!
Just go to your terminal and type pip install GroupCreator
When you have installed it import it in your script and your done!
You can explore it by typing GroupCreator. and then a bunch of stuff will come up to you to choose from.

Thanks for using GroupCreator!

NOTE:
The package is in early ALPHA and may have loads of bugs and stuff, please don't send any hate, rather report them.
I spent LOADS of time on this so please enjoy.
